alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Northern Oglala Lakota; Southern Jackson; Southern Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 2:46AM MST until December 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oglala Lakota County, Bennett County, Southern Oglala Lakota County and Southern Jackson County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Northern Oglala Lakota; Southern Jackson; Southern Oglala Lakota
